title: Emerging Currencies, Stocks Up for Fifth Day After Fed Decision
description: Emerging-market currencies and stocks clocked in a fifth session of gains after the Federal Reserve fulfilled market expectations by keeping interest rates steady on Wednesday.
content: Emerging-market currencies and stocks clocked in a fifth session of gains after the Federal Reserve fulfilled market expectations by keeping interest rates steady on Wednesday.
